    • lobby

      public void lobby​(ClientConnection c, java.lang.String name, int numberOfPlayers)
      This method adds a player to a waitingList, based on the numberOfPlayers paramether After the waiting list is full, the method starts a new march
      Parameters:
      c - the client connection we want to add to the list
      name - the name of the player who joins the lobby
      numberOfPlayers - the size of the match, it can be 2 or 3
